title: Tin can craft
creator_credit: Boy Scouts of America. Visual Education Service
brief_description: Shows how camping utensils can be made from tin cans. Demonstrates the making of kettles, cups, pans etc. Stresses that clean cans must be used, with smooth edges, and that care must be taken when cutting the tin.
